department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Supply fencing repair, maintenance, and installation for DND using various types of fencing such as chain link, wire, and farm type fencing
description: Fencing construction services to the *National Defence, in the form of call-ups for the maintenance of existing chain link, wire and farm type fencing and installation new chain link, wire and farm type fencing
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Tender Information

| Information | Details |
|-------------|---------|
| **Reference Number**: | WS3548487376 |
| **Solicitation Number**: | WS3548487376 |
| **Publication Date**: | September 6, 2022 |
| **Tender Closing Date**: | October 4, 2022, 2:00 PM CDT |

### Tender Details

This is a request for Standing Offer for Fencing Repairs and Installations. The Work involves providing skilled, licensed labor, material, equipment, and supervision for National Defense (DND) Detachment Shilo, Shilo, Manitoba.

### Contractual Information

| Information | Details |
|-------------|---------|
| **Procurement Category**: | CNST |
| **Procurement Method**: | Competitive - Open bidding |
| **Trade Agreements**: | Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) |
| **Solicitation Status**: | Expired |

### End-User Entities

| Information | Details |
|-------------|---------|
| **Department**: | Department of National Defense (DND) |
| **Contact**: | 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada |
| **Contact Person**: | Matthew Keenan (SPAC/PSPC)  matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca |

### Tender Description

The following documents describe the tender in more detail:

* AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by October 4, 2022, at 2:00 PM CDT.
* Work under this Standing Offer (SO) includes the provision of skilled, licensed labor, material, equipment, and supervision as required by National Defense (DND) in the form of call-ups for maintenance of all existing chain link, wire and farm type fencing and installation new chain link, wire and farm type fencing at RPOU(W) Detachment Shilo, Shilo, Manitoba.

### Contact Information

* Matthew Keenan (SPAC/PSPC)
* Phone: [Not Provided]
* Email: [matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
